p:
Nikolova et al. obtained Ru(III) complexes containing benzothiazole derivatives and tested their anticancer activity against K-562 and KE-37 (human leukemic) cell lines. Among all these derivatives, the Ru(III) containing methylbenzothiazole 60 ( Figure 37) exhibited the highest cytotoxic activity against K-562 and KE-37, having IC 50 values of 7.74 ± 2.50 for KE-37 and of 16.21 ± 2.33 for K-562 when compared with the standard drug cisplatin
60 .
